op_data_proto.hpp File Reference

Classes

class  op_data< T1, op_type >
 Class for storing data required for delayed unary operations, such as the operand (e.g. the matrix to which the operation is to be applied) and the unary operator (e.g. inverse). The operand is stored as a reference (which can be optimised away), while the operator is "stored" through the template definition (op_type). The operands can be 'mat', 'rowvec', 'colvec', 'op_data', and 'glue_data'. Note that as 'glue_data' can be one of the operands, more than one matrix can be stored. More...
